headline: A Look At Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Valuation After Earnings Beat And Strong Buybacks
summary: Marathon Petroleum (MPC) is back in focus after adjusted Q4 2025 earnings topped forecasts, supported by higher refining margins, strong refinery utilization and record throughput, along with ongoing buybacks and a recently affirmed dividend. See our latest analysis for Marathon Petroleum. The strong Q4 report, ongoing buybacks and the recently affirmed US$1.00 dividend come on top of a powerful 26.34% year to date share price return and a 353.03% five year total shareholder return. This...
